column3: Previous Image or New Image URL

column4:
There are two possible ways of creating Shopping Ads.
1) Create an ad using the product catalog feed. Link
2) Using a Single Image/Carousel/Video Ad for the Sales (ecommerce) ads.

Facebook Carousel Ads can have a maximum of 10 images.
If you need more than 5 images, you can copy and paste the rows further. (To add more images, simply copy the rows with the existing images and paste them below.)

There are two possible ways for creating Event Ads.
1) Creating Facebook Event ads using pre-existing Facebook Events that have been published organically.
2) Creating a Single Image Ad to advertise the event.

There are two possible ways to boost a Post.
1) Create Facebook ads using a live Existing Organic Posts.
2) Create a Single Image/Video Ad using the Single Image / Video Ad

Facebook HTML5 ads can include animated elements such as buttons, images, and videos.
Facebook HTML5 ads can be displayed in various formats, such as single image ads, carousel ads, and video ads.

html, htm, Max file size 2 MB.
(Total size of uploaded files may not exceed 5 MB.)
The textual content of the image should demonstrate the step-by-step process of using/implementing the AR filter or effect
The textual content of the video should demonstrate the step-by-step process of using/implementing the AR filter or effect
